description:
Sometimes the journey and the destination both count. This extra roomy trekking pack is designed for wilderness seeking souls who aren't in a hurry to get back to city life. Adjustable and breathable, the carrying system is engineered for females. Its spacious internal compartments can handle your base camp essentials (and even a few luxuries) for longer backcountry forays. Trail-access side pockets let you access snacks without taking your pack off. When the mountains brew up a storm, the integrated rain cover lets you shield your supplies from precipitation.

  • VersaFit suspension is light, adjustable and breathable in a female-specific fit
  • Adjustable shoulder harness lets you customize the pack to your torso length
  • Plus size-specific harness and hipbelt provides a better fit for diverse sizes and shapes
  • Sternum strap slides up or down with an integrated whistle in the buckle
  • Floating lid and spindrift collar accommodates different size loads
  • Stretch mesh expanding shove-it pocket fits a shell jacket and secures with single buckle
  • Each side has a trail access stretch pocket and 2 compression straps
  • 2 zippered hipbelt pockets keep small personal items handy
  • Bottom compression straps reduce volume or hold extra gear
  • Shock cord and tool loops let you attached poles or tools
  • Integrated rain cover is removable and stows in a zippered pocket
  • Maximum recommended load: 23kg
name: Gregory Amber 65 Plus Size Backpack - Women's
